_header: Now ye will of love hear
_description: The Parliament of Love — 87 lines in couplets, prefaced by a couplet heading, with a single stanza rhyme royal at lines 25-31, and concluding with an Envoy of three stanzas rhyme royal

CULFf16.First Lines:
Now ȝee that wull of loue lereI counsell yow þat ȝe
                    cum nere…
CULFf16.Last Lines:
…ffor sche þat is the floure of womanhedeAt her oown
                    leyser schalt the syng and rede
CULFf16.Note:
Couplet heading is ‘What so euyr I syng or sey / My wyll is good
                    too preyse here well’ (f. 51)
CULFf16.Attributed Title:
What so euyr I syng or sey / My wyll is good too preyse here well (f.
                    51)
